hero.title: Holland Veranda
hero.subtitle: Verandas, carports, frames and more - for your perfect garden

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our range of high-quality verandas and canopies, perfect for your outdoor space

modern.title: Modern Veranda
modern.description: Clean lines and minimalist design for a contemporary look.

classic.title: Classic Veranda
classic.description: Timeless elegance with traditional details and warm appearance.

glass.title: Glass Sliding Walls
glass.description: Maximum light and flexibility for your veranda.

cta.title: Interested in a veranda?
cta.description: Contact us for a no-obligation consultation about the possibilities for your garden.

history.title: Our History
history.description1: Holland Veranda was founded in 2005 by Jan Jansen, an experienced carpenter with a passion for outdoor living. What started as a small family business has grown into a leading supplier of verandas in the Netherlands.
history.description2: Our mission is to deliver high-quality verandas that are not only functional but also an aesthetic addition to your home. We believe that a veranda is more than just a canopy - it's an extension of your living space to the outdoors.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use only the best materials and work with the greatest precision.

service.title: Service
service.description: Personal advice and excellent customer service are our top priorities.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We strive for sustainable products and responsible production methods.

team.title: Our Team
team.description1: Our team consists of experienced craftsmen who work on your veranda with passion and dedication. From design to installation, we ensure that everything is taken care of down to the smallest detail.
team.description2: Would you like to know more about our verandas or do you have specific wishes? Feel free to contact us. We are happy to help you further!

location.title: Our Location
location.description: Visit our showroom to see our verandas in person.

company.title: About Holland Veranda
company.description: The specialist in quality verandas for your garden. We offer a wide range of modern and classic verandas, perfect for extending your living space.

projects.subtitle: Discover our latest projects across different parts of Europe and get inspired by our quality verandas
projects.description: A beautiful example of our expertise in verandas and canopies

cta.title: Interested in a similar project?
cta.description: Contact us for a no-obligation consultation about the possibilities for your garden
